<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="7934" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">The</word>
		<word type="JJ">great</word>
		<word type="NN">duel</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=",">,</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">the</word>
		<word type="NN">mother</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">all</word>
			<word type="NNS">battles</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">has</word>
		<word type="VBN">begun.…</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">The</word>
		<word type="NN">dawn</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">victory</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">nears</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">as</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">this</word>
			<word type="JJ">great</word>
			<word type="NN">showdown</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">begins</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">!</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="7935" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP">It</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">'s</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB">not</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">as</word>
			<word type="IN">if</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">anyone</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">is</word>
		<word type="VBN">worried</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">that</word>
			<word type="IN">through</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">some</word>
			<word type="JJ">horrible</word>
			<word type="NN">miscalculation</word>
			<word type="PRP">we</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD">could</word>
		<word type="VB">be</word>
		<word type="VBG">removing</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">the</word>
		<word type="JJ">Iraqi</word>
		<word type="NNP-PERS">Abraham</word>
		<word type="NNP-PERS">Lincoln</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">by</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN">mistake</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","4"
